a.n: Thunder/Mavericks, 2011 NBA Western Conference Finals - Game 1 - Popcast

p.k: Added pop up facts throughout the game in which Dirk Nowitzki hit 10 of his first 11 shots from the field and an NBA playoff-record 24 straight free throws on the way to 48 points, leading the Mavericks to a 121-112 victory over the Thunder in Game 1 of the Western Conference finals.
